plot: Nombre Original: Dao jiàn xiàoDirector: WuershanActores: Masanobu Andô, You Benchang, Liu Xiaoye"The Butcher, the Chef and the Swordman" follows three men as they come in possession of a mythical blade. The butcher is a simple man who dreams of courting a high class woman. The Chef seeks revenge against the man that killed his family and whom he will cook dinner for. The Swordsman is a man who hopes to eclipse his father in status.
title: The Butcher, The Chef And The Swordsman

lists.title: Películas asiáticas que no te debes perder.
